properties.areaDesc: Wasatch Mountains I-80 North; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 7:52PM MST until January 13 at 3:00PM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches
in the Bear River Valley, and 8 to 18 inches Wasatch mountains.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountains I-80 North and Wasatch Mountains
South of I-80.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 3 PM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult across the higher
passes and higher valleys, including Sardine Summit, Logan
Summit, and Interstate 80 Parleys Summit.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...This storm will significantly impact
travel late tonight and on through the morning commute.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 3 PM MST MONDAY
